definition: Zhaosu county or Mongghulküre nahiyisi in Ili Kazakh autonomous prefecture 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Zhaosu county or Mongghulküre nahiyisi in Ili Kazakh autonomous prefecture 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

sentences.english: Observation of the wild rapeseed pollen grains under the scanning electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 新疆昭蘇野生油菜花粉形態掃描觀察。

sentences.english: You see the Zhaosu Grassland is flat and wide.
sentences.chinese: 你看這昭蘇草原是平坦寬闊。

sentences.english: Taking Zhaosu county as an example, its rangeland resources classification system is constituted.
sentences.chinese: 以昭蘇縣爲例，建立該縣草地資源分類系統。

sentences.english: We also saw a stone man in Zhaosu.
sentences.chinese: 我們在昭蘇也看到過石人。
